resources.string: This activity shows the Now Playing, Library, Playlists, Payment, and about us.
This activity shows the currently playing song, as well as buttons will go to previous song, next song, play/pause, buy song, and even show you album/song details

This Library Activity shows all of the songs in alphabetical order. It has the album image, song name, album name, artist name. Whn you click on one, a toast will appear saying that the song clicked is now playing.

This Playlist Activity shows the different playlist the user has created with their music. When you click on a image it creates a toast saying it wil take you to that specific playlist
This Payment Activity shows the details about Android Pay API. A \'Buy Now\' button in the Now Playing Activity sends it here to pay
You can learn about adding the Android API by clicking on the link below. To summarize you can make changes to your dependencies and manifest files to accomidate the Android API feature
This About Us Playlist shows a description of the creation of the app
